name: Tourkrub.co Co., Ltd.
description: Operator of a tour and travel portal intended for the outbound tour. The company's platform offers a wide range of leading international tours for filter search with online booking facilities, enabling travel agents and tourists to choose tour packages effortlessly at a reasonable price.
